author: SenneVanPutte
body:
#### PR description:

TkAlMaps for CMSSW_11_2_X:
Adding the tracker map plots.
Tracker alignment independent version of TkMap, now able to plot phase1 tracker.
Meant to compare two alignments by visualising the physical relative displacements.

#### PR validation:

Ran on test tree, output is produced.
title: Adding TkAlMaps (tracker map plots for alignment validation)
